description: This is some video footage taken during Drew’s first time in front of the camera for englishlads. As he strips down to his bright red boxers you can see he gets more comfortable once he has pumped up his muscles and done a bit of posing! And who wouldn’t be proud of a body like this! Big muscles, nicely rounded and so defined and luckily for Drew he was blessed with the “big boy gene” and has a whopper of an uncut cock that rises up and wobbles around for nearly all the shoot! Drew is quite shy and at this stage only just getting used to posing with no clothes, so getting hard and shooting is a big step!
title: BONUS VIDEO of Drew Filmed during his 1st Photo Shoot - Watch his Big Uncut Cock Throb its way through the Shoot!
